items.sentence: What\'s your favorite thing to do with your parents?
I will never forget your kindness as long as I live.
I wish I could figure out how to get Tom to like me.
What\'s the luckiest thing that has happened to you?
What\'s the most important part of a good education?
What\'s the name of the joint we went to last night?
In this word, the accent falls on the last syllable.
This is in one of the largest stadiums in the world.
Tom knew he couldn\'t do what Mary wanted him to do.
Tom knew that Mary didn\'t want to be seen with him.
